url: local://Drow Elite Warrior » Monster Stat Block - DnD 5e.html
name: Drow Elite Warrior

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

url: local://Drow Mage » Monster Stat Block - DnD 5e.html
name: Drow Mage

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The drow has the following wizard spells prepared:

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d 6) poison damage.

actions.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
actions.desc: The drow magically summons a quasit, or attempts to summon a shadow demon with a 50 percent chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

url: local://Drow Priestess of Lolth » Monster Stat Block - DnD 5e.html
name: Drow Priestess of Lolth

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The drow is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The drow has the following cleric spells prepared:

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drow makes two scourge attacks.

actions.name: Scourge
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
actions.desc: The drow attempts to magically summon a yochlol with a 30 percent chance of success. If the attempt fails, the drow takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage. Otherwise, the summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Quenthel has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Quenthel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Lolth's Favor
traits.desc: Quenthel adds her Wisdom modifier to her AC (included in AC).

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
Quenthel is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 22, +14 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following Cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): bane, command, cure wounds, guiding bolt
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon, silence
3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, dispel magic, spirit guardians
4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith
5th level (3 slots): flame strike, insect plague, scrying
6th level (2 slots): harm, heal, word of recall
7th level (2 slots): divine word, fire storm
8th level (1 slot): holy aura
9th level (1 slot): gate

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Quenthel has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Quenthel makes two attacks with her Snake-Headed Whip.

actions.name: Snake-Headed Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned, the target is stunned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Summon Handmaiden (1/Day)
actions.desc: Quenthel magically summons a Yochlol. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of her, acts as an ally, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or Quenthel dies, or until she dismisses it as an action.

legendary.name: Whip Attack
legendary.desc: Quenthel makes one attack with her Snake-Headed Whip.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Quenthel casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells.

reactions.name: Lolth's Retribution
reactions.desc: When Quenthel is hit by an attack, she can use her reaction to deal 22 (4d10) necrotic damage to the attacker (no save).

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a drow or giant spider, or back into its true form (amorphous blob).

traits.name: Mist Form
traits.desc: Can turn into toxic mist.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning plus 21 (6d6) poison.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness
1/day each: confusion, dancing lights, faerie fire

traits.name: Heightened Reflexes
traits.desc: The draegloth adds its proficiency bonus (+3) to its initiative rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Ethereal Jaunt
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the spider can shift between the Material and Ethereal Plane.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit. Hit: 12 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) poison damage.
